channel.title: Review: Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
channel.description:
So, my friends in my RL gaming group have decided to start a website about tabletop RPGs with a mix of reviews, advice, or just whatever comes to mind. My first entry is a review of Hit the Streets by our own Richard Rogers. I also included a link to the Gauntlet game community page in the review as well. I hope you enjoy.
[Hidden Gems (Reviews of the Indie or Obscure); Hit the Streets: Defend the Block](https://tabletopgamergeeks.com/2020/11/08/hidden-gems-reviews-of-the-indie-or-obscure-hit-the-streets-defend-the-block/)

item.title: Review: Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
item.dc:creator: @dannythewall
item.description:
@dannythewall wrote:

Me: Reads the review.

Also me: Looks at my game I’ve been working on for two years or so— the one with street-level heroes, rules lite, narrative powers, d6 dice pools, successes on 4 -5 called Power, complications on 1s called Doom…

::insert swears::

Read full topic
item.source: Review: Hit the Streets: Defend the Block
